name: Cubeox Fighting
description:
A new story fighting game awaits to be played. Cubeox: Rapid Fighting will bring your fighting game experience to a whole new level.

Stroll around, and fight the enemy with your mighty mouse rapid clicking skill!

Take a role as a fighter, a cube box who devotes all of his life to out from an enemy zone. He faces strong fighters and does fighting with each of them in order to save his life, to explore his undiscovered own power limit, and to become the best of the best in Cubeox fight.
